description.lang: Smart Plug can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network.Smart Plug is also a security Z-Wave device and supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.If you want your Smart Plug to be a security device that use secure/encrypted message to communicate in a Z-Wave network, then a security enabled Z-Wave controller is needed.

1. When the state of Smart Plug (turn on or off the load) is changed:1.Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 0:Do not send Basic Report2. Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 1: Send Basic Report3. Set Configuration parameter 0x03 to 2: Send Basic Report only when Load condition is changed not by Z-WAVE Command, such as short pressing.2. Sending Meter Report.
Smart Plug keep detecting the load power, once the AC current exceeds 16A for more than 5s, smart plug's relay will turn off.
The function is disabled
The function is enabled.

name.lang: The value here represents minimum change in wattage (in terms of wattage) for a meter report to be sent

description.lang: When the change value of load power exceeds the setting value, smart plug will send meter report (watt)to associated device (Group Lifeline).
Available settings
The function is disabled.

name.lang: The value here represents minimum change in wattage percent (in terms of percentage) for a meter report (watt) to be sent

description.lang: When the change value of the load power exceeds the setting value, smart plug will send meter report to associated device (Group Lifeline).
Available setting
The function is disabled.

name.lang: Setting device status after power failure

description.lang: Define how the Plug reacts after the power supply is back on.
Smart Plug memorizes its state after a power failure.
Connected device will be on after the power supply is reconnected.
Connected device will be off after the power supply is reconnected.
Lock/unlock all configuration parameters.
Unlock
Lock
Smart Plug can send notifications to associated device (Group Lifeline) when the status of smart plugs load is changed.
The function is disabled.
Send Basic report.
Send Basic report only when Load status is not changed by Z-WAVE Command.
Configure LED Display mode to prevent light pollution at night.
The LED status follows the load change.
when operating the load, The LED lights for 5 seconds and then turns off.
